com.foxhole.tools.spartan.managers.input
Class InputManager

java.lang.Object
  com.foxhole.tools.spartan.managers.input.InputManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISpartanManager, org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener
public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpartanManager, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener

Input manager allows actions to register themselves and receive updates for the target input methods

Author:
Tiago "Spiegel" Costa

 void popFocusLayer()
          Pops a line of focus from the input manager, removing the topmost line of the heap, think of this as the same as the popMatrix from OpenGL
 void pushFocusLayer()
          Pushes a new line of focus, saving the last one into a heap, think of this as the same as the pushMatrix from OpenGL

Method Detail

getInstance

public static InputManager getInstance()
Obtains the current active instance of the render manager

Returns:
a handle the current active instance of the render manager, null if no active instance is selected

pushFocusLayer

public void pushFocusLayer()
Pushes a new line of focus, saving the last one into a heap, think of this as the same as the pushMatrix from OpenGL

popFocusLayer

public void popFocusLayer()
Pops a line of focus from the input manager, removing the topmost line of the heap, think of this as the same as the popMatrix from OpenGL

addFocus

public void addFocus(ISpartanInputListener listener)
              throws SpartanException
Adds a listener to the current focus

Parameters:
listener - the listener to add
Throws:
SpartanException - if no focus line is created

removeFocus

public void removeFocus(ISpartanInputAcceptance listener)
                 throws SpartanException
Removes a listener to the current focus

Parameters:
listener - the listener to remove
Throws:
SpartanException - if no focus line is created
